scripts.build-dist-js: yarn run build-tsickle && yarn run closure-compile
scripts.closure-compile: cat index.js > tmp.js && cat tmp.js | java -jar ./node_modules/google-closure-compiler/compiler.jar --language_in=ECMASCRIPT6 --language_out=ECMASCRIPT5 --externs=externs.js --compilation_level ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS --rewrite_polyfills=false | tee > index.js
scripts.closure-compile-sw: cat sw.js > sw_tmp.js && cat sw_tmp.js | java -jar ./node_modules/google-closure-compiler/compiler.jar --language_in=ECMASCRIPT6 --language_out=ECMASCRIPT5 --externs=sw_externs.js --compilation_level ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS --rewrite_polyfills=false > sw.js
